downloadData.label: Download My Data
downloadData.message: Your data download request has been received. You will receive an email with a download link shortly.

deactivateAccount.label: Deactivate My Account
deactivateAccount.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? This action cannot be undone.
deactivateAccount.confirmMessage: Your account has been deactivated. We're sorry to see you go.
